thread.section_title: La Clef Tour Eiffel Paris - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Truly stunning
thread.title_full: Truly stunning - Review of La Clef Tour Eiffel Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Sandy G
title: Truly stunning
text:
My daughter and I were offered a cappuccino and macaroons while we checked in and we were then told we had been upgraded to the suite. This marked the start of a truly amazing holiday in Paris.
The suite was stunning and even better was the quick walk to the Eiffel Tower. The hotel staff was warm, welcoming and extremely helpful. We will definitely go back. It's a hotel worth every cent.
